text: Actually you don't need to split all words.
You can split you text by last space symbol into two parts using rsplit.

code:
>>> text = 'Python: Cut of the last word of a sentence?'
>>> text.rsplit(' ', 1)[0]
'Python: Cut of the last word of a'
